name: Don't touch the boxes !
description:
Hi. "Don't touch the boxes" is a runner game. 

You must not touch the boxes! Simply. ;)

If you touch :

- Boxes, or walls : You're dead. the game restart. 

- If you quit the map : You're dead. the game restart. 

- The ground : This is your playground.

The Body will be change soon. It's a test.

MUCH MORE SOON ! 

I hope you enjoy this game !
